summary: Provides an integration layer that manages the full lifecycle of the Twistcli security scanner, including downloading the executable, collecting package and vulnerability information, generating scan reports, and asynchronously submitting the results to the Bridgecrew platform.
business_intent: Automate the execution of Twistcli scans within the Checkov framework to gather vulnerability data and report it to Bridgecrew, enabling continuous security assessment of infrastructure code.
